website_summaries.verdict: The best accessory for young fans playing Avengers is Thor’s sturdy, yet safe and spongy Nerf hammer. Just be careful where you swing the mighty Battle Hammer!
pros: Cool lightning effect on hammer sides
Designed after Thor’s hammer as seen in the films
cons: Unfortunately, its handle is not padded at all

customer_reviews.title: Great toy
customer_reviews.text: Great hammer I just wish the handle was also padded so that when my son plays Thor and throws the hammer at me it wouldn't hurt so much. So if you have a child who enjoys throwing the hammer (like I'm sure most children do) I would recommend also buying a helmet and face mask. I've been smashed in the face multiple times by the handle as it has flown through the air. Additionally, we've been lucky that it has not hit the TV or anything breakable (besides my face) yet but I'm sure it's only a matter of time.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: WARNING
customer_reviews.text: This is a great hammer. It is perfect to accompany a costume for a kid or adult. However, if you are buying it for a kid to play with be warned: the handle on this is not padded and is EXTREMELY painful to get hit with. If you are looking for a combat toy, I would highly recommend passing this one up for a nerf type toy that is padded on ALL parts. This toy WILL be responsible for many tears if your little ones start swinging it. (Probably several of your own tears as well if you venture into battle with them.)
customer_reviews.author: ASPoston

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: My son loved this hammer for his Thor costume. It's not cheap plastic like so many others I found. It has a nice weight to it...so nice that it makes a great little throwing hammer (some might frown on this). Thankfully, it's foam, so it doesn't hurt when you get pelted with it. I just wish it had the design on both sides.
customer_reviews.author: Barrel Nut

customer_reviews.title: If you are worthy
customer_reviews.text: If you want to feel like a BA, get this hammer. When you get the random urge to run throughout the house smashing things this is a great alternative to your 4 lb sledge. Well made, the head is nerf feeling so you can actually hit things without causing damage and is connected to the plastic handle very well. It is surprisingly sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Mackenzie Mullins

customer_reviews.title: Fun and fairly safe
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it he smashes everything with it. The whole head is foam so no one should get hurt.
customer_reviews.author: retail-prn

customer_reviews.title: Durable and fun for a young child
customer_reviews.text: This Thor hammer is one of my 5 year old sons favorite go to toys. First I ordered a Thor plastic hammer and my son hit the couch with it and it broke so we ordered this one. It is rather small but good for a young child and my son loves the lightening on it. Going thru the other hammers on here this was by far the best option for my young son, the cheap one was too cheap and the expensive ones are just too pricey for a toy like this. All in all it was a great purchase
customer_reviews.author: Teec

customer_reviews.title: 10 year old LOVES this.
customer_reviews.text: Be prepared for your little one to transform into Thor immediately. Great material and does not hurt the dog nor kids nor parents even at a full swing repeatedly while proclaiming dominance and powers of the bifrost or Ragnoroxk or something to that effect. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Papa TTop Contributor: Golf

customer_reviews.title: Fun until it fell apart
customer_reviews.text: Cool looking when it arrived. Seemingly sturdy foam at first. Then the paint started to flake off and eventually the foam began to disintegrate too. Had to throw it away. Could have been so much better but its really junky.
customer_reviews.author: momknows

customer_reviews.title: Not for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: Quite small, picture makes it appear much larger and it is made of foam which my granddaughter took many bites out of easily, choking hazard
customer_reviews.author: Jason C.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome durability
customer_reviews.text: Great size for a 6 year old, and it is nice and soft. Its a decent foam, and is definitely not going to last long, but my kid sure is beating the cr*p out of it. Its lasted longer than I would have thought given the beating its taken.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy
customer_reviews.text: Fun product! Bought this for a theatrical production and it withstood all the throwing around we had. It's nice and light but still packs a punch if you really hit it because of the dense head. Would make a fun toy as well!
customer_reviews.author: fiona phalange

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: It lacks the magical mind control of the one in the movie, but I suppose I wouldn't want my grandchild to have that power anyway. Nice foam doesn't bruise when he whacks me with it.
customer_reviews.author: TechDr

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old loves it, as the other reviews said the handle is hard but oh well. The lighting look wears off over time, my sons had it for a couple months and it’s starting to wear off but he beats a lot of stuff with it ;)
customer_reviews.author: Suzanna W

customer_reviews.title: Not what in the picture... plush tiny hammer.
customer_reviews.text: Not what I ordered and not what represented in the picture. Got a small plush hammer with a 4 inch handle which shortens as the handle pokes out of the top. Definitely a knock off. It’s a pity really. My 3 year old son was truly looking forward to playing with this.
customer_reviews.author: Andres B.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price...but hope to make a merry Christmas
customer_reviews.text: Amazing how I spent almost 25$ on this. It shouldn’t cost more than 10$. Anyway, it’s on the top of my sons Christmas list...so...Merry Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Thor hammer for Toddlers
customer_reviews.text: Our son is very much into Marvel and Superhero dress up. We had a previous hammer that came with a costume and that hammer was a hard plastic so he could not play with it very much. So happy we found this hammer. It is soft foam and does not hurt if he accidently swings and hits someone with it. The hammer is also small enough that he can easily carry it around. He has been playing with it for about 8 weeks straight now and it shows little signs of daily use.
customer_reviews.author: WWeber

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy and pretty safe.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great toy. Safer than other things we have tried. Shows a little wear after a few months but we are pretty rough with it.
customer_reviews.author: Walker3000

customer_reviews.title: Lightening started peeling off
customer_reviews.text: This was one of the gifts my son asked for for Christmas. Since then the lightening has started peeling off the hammer.
customer_reviews.author: Starr Hankins

customer_reviews.title: As the other reviews state, the blue color with ...
customer_reviews.text: As the other reviews state, the blue color with the lightning peels off fairly quickly. My sons have been playing with it for less than a week, and it's already starting to crack and peel.
customer_reviews.author: Bridget Yurt

customer_reviews.title: My son is still playing with it
customer_reviews.text: He got it for Christmas and is still beating his sister with it 5 months later.
customer_reviews.author: Richard S.

customer_reviews.title: Hammer
customer_reviews.text: This hammer is soft foam like you would expect from nerf. It is the perfecf kid size- fits my 5yo. Just be ready to have your little one beat you with a foam hammer.
customer_reviews.author: Bacon

customer_reviews.title: Birthday gift
customer_reviews.text: My eight year old bought this with his birthday money and has played with it a lot over the past 24 hours but the paint on the foam part is already starting to wear off in places and there is a rip in the foam part. He said that he wished he would have gotten a different one.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Son loves it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son. He plays with it for less than a day and the lightning overlay began peeling. Have had this maybe a month and there is no more paint covering the hammer portion. So disappointing. His last hammer lasted three years before this happened.
customer_reviews.author: Ashton Klink

customer_reviews.title: Nice toy that came with missing piece.
customer_reviews.text: Received hammer with torn cardboard and missing bottom hammer strap. Aside from that, it's not a bad toy for kids to smash things around with. But without the strap, the kid can't reenact the hammer spin Thor is famous for doing.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Ricard

customer_reviews.title: Pricey little thing.
customer_reviews.text: This hammer is so small! My kids ripped it down the middle but was easily fixed with a hot glue gun. Way too expensive for such a small toy.
customer_reviews.author: Fernando Miranda

customer_reviews.title: Nerf Material!  Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: My just turned 3yr old son LOVES the Avengers and has been wanting Thor's Hammer for awhile but who gives a 3yr old a hammer? Finally, I found this one and it's made of Nerf material so he can hit things and be crazy. Plus, we don't have to worry about him hurting himself, his little sister, or breaking our stuff. It's really fun, solidly made, but kid friendly. It's awesome and he loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea M. Gray

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: It is small but sturdy. The perfect size for my 3 year old
customer_reviews.author: andrelle luster

customer_reviews.title: Good for its value.
customer_reviews.text: Great design and Good for playing, the ‘head’ of the hammer is made of soft foam, which makes it easy to break.
customer_reviews.author: Carmin Cabrera

customer_reviews.title: Great hammer
customer_reviews.text: Son thinks he's Thor. This was a soft enough material I wasn't afraid he would hurt my younger daughter.
customer_reviews.author: SMc

customer_reviews.title: Looks worse in person
customer_reviews.text: My six year old thought this was too small and bad looking. returned.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: my son loves it.. the foam is perfect so if/ when he wacks his sister it will not be too bad. overall great toy..
customer_reviews.author: pjrst16

customer_reviews.title: Put a strap on it
customer_reviews.text: My 6-yr-old really enjoyed this to go with his Thor costume. It would be nice if it had a leather or fake leather strap on the end to hang from the wrist or some other thing to prevent loss. As kids have a tendency to set things down and leave them, I had to search for it twice Halloween night
customer_reviews.author: Nixxy

customer_reviews.title: Not a toy.
customer_reviews.text: Don’t get for children. Thing is like a darn weapon
customer_reviews.author: Marky McClain

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight and hollow inside but my sons think the lightning picture on it is cool. Also it has held up well with as much as he forcefully slams it into things.
customer_reviews.author: B3K1nd

customer_reviews.title: Crapshoot as to whether it's going to work or not
customer_reviews.text: It quit the noise making feature two days after arriving
customer_reviews.author: Dave L.

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hammer for my almost 2 year old son since he is going to be Thor for Halloween. He loves it! He wants to have hammer fights all the time - he takes the Thor hammer and gives me or my husband an inflatable carnival prize hammer. I like that it's nerf so he can't do too much damage with it. It's a good size for my son but would be small for an older child.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne

customer_reviews.title: Too expensive for what you get.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased two different ones, one for $11 and this one for $30 (approximate plus tax)... the $11 one was just as nice. $30 looks deceiving in pics, the hammer didn’t look the same when it arrived. For the price the buyer paid, it should of had battery operated lighting.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: perfect for small children
customer_reviews.text: the boy who got it as a christmas present love it, the handle is hard plastic with details, the hammer itself is made out of foam, painted in silver with carved runes, its amazing for children to play with because is soft enough,I dont think it was built to endure tough playing with, the thunder/lighting print is only on one side, NOT FOR ADULT COSTUMES but Great for -10 years old playing! GOOD TOY!
customer_reviews.author: Lukas Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Better for 2/3yr olds
customer_reviews.text: It would be good for a two year old. Plastic handle and foam hammer head. I returned it. Not worth $30.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: Just like many other reviews said, it was damaged when it arrived. The end of the handle was bent and squished. It didn't make any sounds either. Had it not been so close to Christmas we would have returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Fun, but peeling
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it, but the blue and white lightning is peeling off after a few months of play
customer_reviews.author: Anna C. Polson

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for a small kid. Its good quality and it was what i expected to recieve.
customer_reviews.author: henry quintero

customer_reviews.title: Would not purchase again.
customer_reviews.text: Our grandson wanted this for his birthday. The joy on his face was priceless. The shock on our face , at a small plastic toy with stickers for the price paid, was not.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Cheek

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and durable!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product! Got it for my son as a gift and he plays with it all the time. He likes the lightning design on the hammer.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Super cool! Gave it as a gift and it was really well received! Really fun toy and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Lynsey Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for my 3 1/2 year old
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for my 3 1/2 year old. Looks like he will grow into a larger hammer soon but this is really well made and the foam head is perfect median hard to soft!
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Renta

customer_reviews.title: Great toddler toy
customer_reviews.text: Love that it’s made out of foam. Paint started peeling already though.
customer_reviews.author: Jillian Zoey Zheng

customer_reviews.title: huge disappointment
customer_reviews.text: I gave this as well as the costume and mask to my 5 year old grandson. The first time he and his friends played with this hammer, the lightning basically wore off. This was a big disappointment to all and somehow, the whole outfit lost it's allure.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Buckingham

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old loves this hammer. The hammer head is soft
customer_reviews.author: surfacemac77

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it!!!
customer_reviews.text: After seeing Avengers Endgame it was a must have for my son. He loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Soft, foam hammer about six to eight inches in length. Perfect for a kid.
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what it seems to be. It's a soft, foam hammer that's about six to eight inches in length. It's durable enough for a kid to run around with and isn't going to damage anything around your house.
customer_reviews.author: J. Inouye

customer_reviews.title: Lower quality.
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived with a rip in the foam part of the hammer. Totally bummed. I don’t see this lasting very long.
customer_reviews.author: Ebyson

customer_reviews.title: Christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: I brought the hammer as a Christmas gift for my grandson. He loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Jay2512

customer_reviews.title: Good hammer for a Thor fan
customer_reviews.text: My son has been asking for a Thor hammer since the first movie came out, and when he saw this one, he HAD to have it. It's exactly as described, nothing special. It doesn't light up, the light streaks are just painted on. But it works for an imaginative little boy!
customer_reviews.author: WDRM

customer_reviews.title: BETTER THAN I EXPECTED
customer_reviews.text: Great toy. I though it was made of hard plastic but it's not, it's soft, so it's Perfect for boys 'cause they can pretend they're Thor without hurting anyone. Recommended with eyes closed
customer_reviews.author: MACM_20

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I thought the hammer was bigger than it actually turned out to be. Returned it and found another hammer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This was a Christmas present for my son and he ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas present for my son and he carries this thing around all the time. I know it is well made because, his siblings and I take a beating from it.
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: So small!!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for a 7 year old but had to return as soon as I received it. This is a ridiculously small hammer. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: michelle

customer_reviews.title: don’t purchase by looking at the picture
customer_reviews.text: not worth the buy, this is something that could have been purchased out the one dollar store. I will be returning
customer_reviews.author: Marti Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Look at actually deminstions
customer_reviews.text: Well made but about a third of the size it should be. Think baby rattle.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Roberson

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old son played with this for 5 minutes and the foam began cracking and calling off. Piece of crap china should be ashamed.
customer_reviews.author: Noah Morris

customer_reviews.title: exactly what we wanted
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what my little boy wanted. It is heavy duty foam so it won't break quickly as many toys we get do. I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Goad

customer_reviews.title: Lighting on the face.... much cheaper the the disconntinued one though
customer_reviews.text: Still a great buy, missed out on buying the 1st one, but this one came out and I purchased right away! The lighting on the one of the face is eh... but otherwise well worth it ! It is smaller than one might think
customer_reviews.author: dutchschoon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for boys who throw things! Just keep away from littles who might take bites out of it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The li'l dude in our house was thrilled to get ...
customer_reviews.text: The li'l dude in our house was thrilled to get this... it's not too soft, but it will bounce off a cousin's head without leaving a dent. (Experience speaking there...)
customer_reviews.author: S. McGarvey

customer_reviews.title: CRAP! So sad and disappointed as my nephew adores ...
customer_reviews.text: CRAP! So sad and disappointed as my nephew adores Thor and his helmet and even this piece of junk. Within 3 days the blue paint stared peeling off and is completely gone. If he wasn't so attached, I'd take it from him and return it. Two thumbs down Hasbro!
customer_reviews.author: ShineBrighter

customer_reviews.title: Soft and durable
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this item and it’s soft so as he throws it around in battle nothing gets hurt destroyed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Match this with the Thor Halloween costume and your in for a fun play day
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old was hammering all day. Match this with the Thor Halloween costume and your in for a fun play day.
customer_reviews.author: Amerz

customer_reviews.title: Feel the Power of Thunder
customer_reviews.text: This is a blast, I have actually bought three of them because the kids love them so much. Pretty sturdy form, the perfect size for kids.
customer_reviews.author: Nvisioned

customer_reviews.title: Happy child, happy Mom!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son, good material since has survive all the hard use a Toddler and 7yol can make. Looks very real and big my Son LOVE IT!!!
customer_reviews.author: Gayle J Garcia Lara

customer_reviews.title: Good buy. Not built to last.
customer_reviews.text: This nerf hammer got destroyed really fast... But then again, my nephew tends to act like a dog so I never expected it to hold up for eternity.
customer_reviews.author: waldensa1

customer_reviews.title: High Price Low Quality
customer_reviews.text: This product was a lot smaller than I expected it to be. It is not durable either. The first time my son squeezed the foam, it tore. I do not see this toy lasting very long at all.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Mc

customer_reviews.title: Great toy
customer_reviews.text: My son loves Thor and would not let it go for a while...went everywhere with it!
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: Too expensive
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was a nicer quality but it was just cheap plastic the price was way to high for this it should have been like $9
customer_reviews.author: Amy McIntosh

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nephew loves this thing! Soft Nerf material makes it easier on the furniture!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Bordner

customer_reviews.title: Love the hammer
customer_reviews.text: Love the hammer. Not nearly as durable as I would prefer since my kids have wrecked it pretty well in short order (2 months). It has many cracks and is almost ready for the trash bin.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Good for demos
customer_reviews.text: It is functional for what I needed it for. SCA thrown weapons demo. It gives people an idea of what throwing weapons is like.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just as described
customer_reviews.text: Just as described. My son plays VERY rough with his and other than the paint chipping off, it’s in good shape
customer_reviews.author: Jonah Atkins

customer_reviews.title: Okay For Air Battle Only
customer_reviews.text: Even though there were a few knicks on this hammer when we got it, I thought it was cool; after about a week though it started cracking and we were pulling the blue thunder display off of it little by little and now there is no thunder. As long as your child only waves it in the air and doesn't hit anything it should hold up but where's the fun in that.
customer_reviews.author: PChew

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Thor costume
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my 2 1/2 year olds Thor costume. He of course hits everything with this so it's nice that it's foam. It doesn't make any noise either which is nice too.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Giles

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous quality. Ordered this for a Halloween costume & ...
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous quality. Ordered this for a Halloween costume & it is still going strong, even in a house of 3 little boys!
customer_reviews.author: Fit & Travel Fam

customer_reviews.title: Durible
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my grandson the day he left the hospital. He absolutely LOVED it. It’s a good size and easy to “wield”.
customer_reviews.author: Dolores T.

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son. Great foam hammer for the price
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: It's great. And in case anybody is wondering
customer_reviews.text: It's great. And in case anybody is wondering, it only has lightning on one side. I was looking for something for display and playtime and I didn't like the lightning on it. Luckily when it arrived it looked normal on the other side. We love it.
customer_reviews.author: Notch Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for 4 yr old...
customer_reviews.text: Seems so simple but this thing was a hit! My nephew, age 4, did not let this thing out of his sight for the weekend!
customer_reviews.author: ErinHotn

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: It's great. Made of like the nerf material so not too painful if you get wacked.
customer_reviews.author: Lizette Palacios

customer_reviews.title: Small, but fun.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty fun, but smaller than it looks. Durable and soft. Looks as pictured.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Cook

customer_reviews.title: Eh...
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking but won't last long gets torn up easily
customer_reviews.author: THE W

customer_reviews.title: Thor's Battle Hammer
customer_reviews.text: It's smaller than I expected, however, my Grandson is going to LOVE IT.
customer_reviews.author: GF Mom

customer_reviews.title: This hammer is adorable and goes perfectly with Thor Basic Helmet we purchased ...
customer_reviews.text: This hammer is adorable and goes perfectly with Thor Basic Helmet we purchased as well. My Superhero loving little guy loves Thor and we can't wait to see his face when he opens this on his birthday!
customer_reviews.author: Katherine V

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Present!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a 4 year old! He loved i! He did not put it down from the moment he opened the wrapping :)
customer_reviews.author: namb

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Son absolutely loves. And mom approves of the soft foam used for it
customer_reviews.author: kandice marchio

customer_reviews.title: Fun for 4-year old
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my 4-year old's birthday. He loved it. It's a good size and soft. Very fun with Thor costume as well.
customer_reviews.author: CBach

customer_reviews.title: For my son
customer_reviews.text: This was a last-minute Christmas purchase that worked out amazingly well. I saw it and knew my 5-year-old would love it. He plays with it every day. Definitely worth it :)
customer_reviews.author: janae

customer_reviews.title: A+
customer_reviews.text: My kid hits me in the face with this all the time. Sucker still hurts. Great item thought. Cheaper than other online stores.
customer_reviews.author: Persona Non Grata

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Son loves it but it's a lot smaller than expected

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: didn't take long for it to get tore up. I blame the child though
customer_reviews.author: sgtmuckyduck

customer_reviews.title: easy for any child over 2 years old to
customer_reviews.text: Light weight, easy for any child over 2 years old to hold
customer_reviews.author: Kimberli Dorn

customer_reviews.title: My toddler love the Thor hammer made up really good
customer_reviews.text: My toddler love the Thor hammer made up really good . I like the fact that it is light weight .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My 5yr old takes his Thor hammer everywhere, he loves to play with it
customer_reviews.author: Veronica M.

product_meta.title: Thor Marvel The Dark World Battle Hammer
product_meta.description:
FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Take on the identity of the bringer of lightning with this awesome Thor Battle Hammer. Villains will fear you when you swing this powerful hammer and you'll feel just like Thor as you battle the forces of evil. Hasbro and all related terms are trademarks of Hasbro.
feature_bullets: Thor Battle Hammer lets you take on the identity of your favorite superhero
Foam hammer looks like the mighty hammer of Thor

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars364 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
